title: My Google Bookshelf
description: Full Stack MERN application to search for books from the public Google Books API, and store them in a custom Mongo data base.

title: Moon-Math.online
description: Full Stack MERN blog that allows authors to blog articles.  Includes user logins image uploads, etc.

title: LightBurst 3.0
description: The game consists of a square grid of lights. When the game starts, a random pattern of these lights is switched on. The goal of the puzzle is to switch all the lights off. Originally writen in Objective C, I converted the codebase to Flutter for cross platform compatibility including iOS and Android

title: JerryFrost.com
description: This is a custom portfolio website designed and built for Jerry Frost, an artist in San Francisco, California.

title: AmyGraham.art
description: This is a custom portfolio website designed and built for artist Amy Graham

title: Dority Design Works
description: A custom website designed and built for my graphic design and web hosting consulting business - Dority Design Works

title: Bart Dority Online
description: This is my portfolio website.  It uses a NodeJS backend API server which handles the contact form, and React for the frontend. It is hosted on my own virtual private server where I host my clients websites.
